reviewText: If you own a big boat and are new to twin engines, this is a must read.
Really shallow.  Not worth the money.  Bad video technique.  A lot of wasted, dead time.  Don't waste your money.  I was very disappointed.

Camera views continue to switch back and forth...mixing up your perception.

.the camera should be from a pilots view including the controls so you can relate..to being on the boat...showed to different people....same conclusion....bad use of video.
